text: Samia Maxine Longchambon (née Ghadie, previously Smith; born 13 July 1982) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the role of Maria Connor in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2000–present). ==Early life== Samia Ghadie was born in Eccles, Greater Manchester to Joseph, a French-Lebanese shop owner and Patsy, an English actress whom he met whilst working in Abu Dhabi. Samia lived there for a period as a child. She has a brother named Tariq. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Samia Longchambon
